Last night, a large-scale Russian Geran-2 drone attack targeted the city of Chornomorsk, Odesa Oblast.
Approximately 16 drones took part in the attack, all of which targeted the "Temp" 110 kV railway substation.
Coordinates: 46.318178, 30.639338

Last night, a large-scale Russian Geran-2 drone attack targeted the city of Chornomorsk, Odesa Oblast.
Approximately 16 drones took part in the attack, all of which targeted the "Temp" 110 kV railway substation.
Coordinates: 46.318178, 30.639338

The IDF military operation, dubbed "Operation Five Stones" continues in the northern West Bank.   In the town of Qabatiya, a Palestinian fighter affiliated with Hamas threw an IED at Israeli infantry. Israeli soldiers responded with fire, killing the militant‚Ä¶

Israel's new military operation in the northern West Bank continues into its second day.
The IDF continues carrying out raids in settlements they deployed to earlier, and have also begun raiding the city of Qalqiya, Nablus, the eastern suburbs of Tulkarm, and the village of Kafr Thulth.
Additional widespread arrests have been made in various different settlements, and road closures remain in place, limiting Palestinian movement. IDF military bulldozers also demolished additional streets in the town of Tamun. 
The centre of these operations remain in the city of Tubas, where hundreds of IDF soldiers have been deployed.

The professional think tank with so-called experts working for it has resorted to the linear warfare argument.
They are openly lying about how attritional wars are fought, but people will just eat it up.

Several Israeli airstrikes have targeted southern Lebanon. 
Explosions were heard in Al-Mahmoudiya, Al-Jarmaq, Nahr Nabaa Tasa, and Jabal Al-Rafie

Several Israeli airstrikes have targeted southern Lebanon. 
Explosions were heard in Al-Mahmoudiya, Al-Jarmaq, Nahr Nabaa Tasa, and Jabal Al-Rafie
Several Israeli airstrikes on the Bekaa Valley, northeastern Lebanon.
Repeated Israeli airstrikes on southern Lebanon.
Repeated Israeli airstrikes on southern Lebanon.

Russian forces have captured the village of Shakhove, Dobropillya direction, Donetsk Oblast.
Pre-war population: ~899.
Total land area: ~2.29 km¬≤.
The 2nd battle for Shakhove lasted approximately 1 month, 10 days.
Vovchansk city centre after 565 days of fighting for the city.

In the evening, one Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile launched from near Simferopol, Crimea, impacted the Buialyk airfield in Odesa Oblast. 
This airfield was likely used for launches of long-range UAVs at Crimea. Media 1 shows the Iskander being launched. 
Coordinates: 46.89287, 30.69906

In the evening, one Russian Iskander-M ballistic missile launched from near Simferopol, Crimea, impacted the Buialyk airfield in Odesa Oblast. 
This airfield was likely used for launches of long-range UAVs at Crimea. Media 1 shows the Iskander being launched. 
Coordinates: 46.89287, 30.69906

The IDF stated that 6 of its soldiers were injured, including 3 officers, during clashes in the village of Beit Jinn, southern Syria.
Israeli soldiers were deployed to the village in order to arrest multiple Islamist militants, reportedly from the Jaama Islamiya group. They were immediately met with resistance by several armed fighters. Airstrikes were subsequently carried out to support the soldiers, killing at least 9 people including multiple militants
Last night, Ukrainian long-range UAVs once again attacked the city of Saratov. At least one impact was recorded at the Saratov Oil Refinery, resulting in a fire subsequently breaking out.
Last night, Ukrainian long-range UAVs once again attacked the city of Saratov. At least one impact was recorded at the Saratov Oil Refinery, resulting in a fire subsequently breaking out.

Overnight, Russia carried out another large-scale Geran-2 drone attack on eastern Dnipropetrovsk Oblast.
4-5 Gerans impacted the railway station in the village of Zaliznychne. Both attached videos show the impacts, as seen from neighbouring settlements.
At least 4 Gerans impacted an unknown target in/near the city of Shakhtarske.
Another 4 Gerans impacted two targets in the central and southern parts of Vasylkivka. One of the drones targeting the town centre failed to detonate.
At least 2 Gerans impacted Novomykolaivka, likely targeting the railway station.

At least 2 Gerans impacted Novomykolaivka, likely targeting the railway station.

The IDF stated that 6 of its soldiers were injured, including 3 officers, during clashes in the village of Beit Jinn, southern Syria.  Israeli soldiers were deployed to the village in order to arrest multiple Islamist militants, reportedly from the Jaama Islamiya‚Ä¶
During the clashes in southern Syria, an Israeli Humvee vehicle was disabled by local fighters. The vehicle was abandoned and subsequently struck by the Israeli Airforce.

Russian Army Opens New Front And Advances Deeper In Siversk (Videos)
On November 27, the Russian military made gains in the city of Siversk, close to the city of Krasny Liman and began advancing in a new direction in Donetsk.
The Yug [South] Group of Forces captured the entire northeastern part of Siversk, pushing Ukrainian troops to the area along and to the west of the railway splitting the city in half.
The advance of Russian troops in Siversk has been faster than expected. However, Kiev forces will likely show more resistance in the west part of the city. They could also fall back to the western outskirts of the city and use the Bakhmutka River as a natural barrier.
üëâ

Overview of Russian-Ukrainian Strikes: Russia Boosts Its Missile Arsenal And Shifts To Reusable Drones
On November 26-27, against the backdrop of discussions about possible peace initiatives, Russia and Ukraine continued to exchange strikes of moderate intensity. According to a statement from the Russian Ministry of Defense, on the night of November 27, Russian air defense systems destroyed 137 UAVs over several regions of the country. For its part, the  Ukrainian Air Force reported that during this period, the Russian side used 142 attack UAVs.
At the same time, the US Army Secretary Dan Driscoll, speaking at a closed meeting in Kyiv, stated that Russia has reached a level of long-range missile production that allows it not only to carry out regular strikes on Ukraine but also to form strategic stockpiles. According to The New York Times, this factor was the key argument in Driscoll's appeal to European diplomats to accelerate the achievement of peace agreements. 
üëâ
 Read more 
HERE

Breakthrough In Dibrova: Russia Threatens Ukraine‚Äôs Control Over Road To Sloviansk
The Russian command claims that assault groups have entered Dibrova in the Krasny Liman sector. Russian assault units have seized control of the eastern outskirts of Siversk and advanced to the city center. Ukrainian forces have abandoned Shakhove in the Druzhkivka sector. 
Slovakian Prime Minister Robert Fico has called on the European Union to stop providing aid to Ukraine.

Israeli Forces Came Under Attack In Syria, Over 13 Killed In Clashes And Strikes (videos) 
Israeli troops came under attack while operating in southern Syria early on November 28, with reports indicating that over a dozen people, including women and children, were killed in retaliatory strikes.
In a statement, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) said that troops of the 55th Reserve Paratroopers Brigade set out in the early morning to detain members of the al-Jama‚Äôa al-Islamiyya (Islamic Group), following intelligence information collected in recent weeks indicating that they were operating in the Syrian town of Beit Jinn and worked to advance attacks on Israel.
"During the operation, terrorists opened fire at IDF troops, who returned fire," the military said, adding that the Israeli Air Force also struck the area to support the ground troops.
The IDF admitted two officers and a reservist were seriously hurt as a result of the fire. 
Read more 
HERE
